title: Wow! You'll love this amazing Apartment home in Stamford

$1905', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'In real estate, they say location is everything and The Residences on Bedford is hard to beat.', 'Located right outside the heart of Stamford, CT, we are surrounded by tranquil neighborhoods, beautiful parks, and a spectacular view of Long Island Sound.', 'Our proximity to downtown Stamford provides our residents with quick access to nearby restaurants and beachside fun.', "No matter what your lifestyle, you'll love living at The Residences on Bedford.", 'Security Deposit:', '$1250', 'Length of Lease:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', '(203) 208-3262', 'Property Features:', '➢ 24 Hour Convenience Store', '➢ Bowling Alley', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gas Grills', '➢ On-Site Park', '➢ Parks Nearby', '➢ Play Area', '➢ Pool', '➢ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '➢ Beautiful Picnic Areas', '➢ Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '➢ Elegant Clubroom', '➢ Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '➢ Ice Skating Rink **', 'Winter Only', '➢ Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '➢ Near Downtown Stamford', '➢ Online Payments Available', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ All Units Come With Brand New Hardwood Floors!', '➢ Balcony', '➢ Black Appliances', '➢ Blinds', '➢ Garage', '➢ Gas Ranges', '➢ Large, Private Balconies', '➢ Storage Units', '➢ Updated Interior Finishes', 'Pets:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Ready to Lease?', 'Call our office at (203) 208-3262', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Proudly managed by JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DA45B2ACBE25455']
